Question.Subject: Is there a program that will let me update my MySpace, Facebook, and Twitter?
Question.Content:
I have accounts with all of them and I normally update my statuses via mobile phone. I just wanted to know if there was a program that will let me do that via computer :D
I heard about TweetDeck but I haven't tried it yet. Any ideas :) Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Try going to the websites and doing it that way.... If youre at school/work and you need to get around a firewall blocker then you should try www.atproxy.net or www.camolist.com

Answer.Content: Try going to the websites and doing it that way.... If youre at school/work and you need to get around a firewall blocker then you should try www.atproxy.net or www.camolist.com
